author: dben_155
title: Nice set, but...
review:
I've bough this set for my nephew. The first impression in the box was amazing and the price was not bad. The biggest surprise coming to my mind when I open up the box, and I understand that the size was not right for her finger. The ring is open in down but the plastic is so hard that it can't really fit in her finger.

Super cute piceces are included, very nice idea, but ther's no way to test the size before to buy it.
